Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.build

Class MyConstruction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.build.MyConstruction
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstructionManagerTest.MyCard.MyTestConstruction, MovementManagerTest.MyCard.MyTestConstruction
public class MyConstruction
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing a Player's Construction and providing all the operations it needs to evaluate a Construction move correctness.
Author:
AndreaAltomare

  • Method Details

    • executeMove

      public boolean executeMove​(BuildMove move, Worker worker) throws OutOfBoardException
      This method check for the correctness of the move provided, then actually executes it.
      Parameters:
      move - (Move to execute)
      worker - (Worker who has executed the move)
      Returns:
      (Move was successfully executed ? true : false)
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - (Exception handled by Controller)

    • checkMove

      public boolean checkMove​(BuildMove move, Worker worker)
      This method check for the correctness of the move provided.
      Parameters:
      move - (Move to check)
      worker - (Worker who has executed the move)
      Returns:
      (Move is allowed ? true : false)

      b - (Second provided Cell)
      Returns:
      (Cell a and Cell b are equal ? true : false)
